TopicTitle: kylelander's guide to installing Real Solar System and Realism Overhaul on KSP 1.10.1

Articles.Content:
Hello there.

I've seen a lot of threads asking how to and is RSS/RO supported on KSP 1.10.

Well, after 36 hours of me banging my head on the wall, here's the "kylelender's guide to installing RSS/RO on KSP 1.10"

Step 1: Download Jesus Rodriguez Valencia's RSS visual pack (found here), and copy the contents into your GameData folder.

Step 2:Launch the game, and close it when you reach the main menu.

Step 3  (Optional) :Install Katniss' Cape Canaveral (Found here)

Step 4: Open CKAN and install RealismOverhaul

Step 5: Verify if everything works

Step 6: Install your mods

Step 65:Enjoy!

Questions:
Q: I can only see half the space center! The rest is all black!
A:Reinstall RSS
Q: The game doesn't load!
A1: Check what mod the game is still loading, delete it, run the game and see if it loads, then reinstall the problematic mod.
A2:Be patient. If it doesn't load in 10 minutes then a mod is causing it.(If so, Refer to A1.)
 

Edited December 16, 2020 by kylelander
I did it as stated but i just get the infinite loading screen where its a black screen thay says loading in the bottom right with the planets going aroumd the sun really fast.

On 12/4/2020 at 4:42 AM, YaBoyShredderson said:

I did it as stated but i just get the infinite loading screen where its a black screen thay says loading in the bottom right with the planets going aroumd the sun really fast.

Does MM report an error?

You can show me your Player.log and i might be able to help
I would not recommend trying to get RO to work on 1.10. It is not officially supported. Expect things to break or bug out. There's not much to be gained from moving from 1.8.1 to 1.10 though.

9 hours ago, Teykn said:

I would not recommend trying to get RO to work on 1.10. It is not officially supported. Expect things to break or bug out. There's not much to be gained from moving from 1.8.1 to 1.10 though.

Yes. Only mild performance gains are expected, and please do not contact Jesus Rodriguez Valencia for support, this is a highly experimental pack and is not official.
